
# Cardano Example Dapp

## **Arguments and ISL**

Script that will test and explore subroutines, argument passing and ISL execution


## Try it online: 

-  Visit [HTML5 Dapp](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Arguments%20and%20ISL.html)
-  Run [Standalone URL dapp connection](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/api/2/run/1-H4sIAAAAAAAAA-1SzYrbMBB-FeHLthCILTuaJLf0VrqH0rSn0oNsyWuBbRlp1G4a_O4d2Zu_ktIXCAJbmvl-ZoY5Jmiw1ck22bmX0OkePZO9Yh_3z8kiUdpXzgxobE-I_XRn2Ehkv0zbMtQeJ7R-HVrrNPOhdDag6bVfMPkmyAbpvelfTrqE1lWYNBcJHoZoPtvQ22kMrv_25fmzRNQu2jaIw3a5bG0l28Z63OZpmi6V7uxSDmap5DAQkUqwDneeCGTsd72aW3CBNI7xt9c_tZPtV9NpH0Nv1qabiftTCZEe87W1lD4-YWM8840NrWKlZpXthoBaMdOjZZJ5dNTc00jMUrrICMGod-_nwO9JYo4QZpzlPxw-6UP0SG_Ti4TH6FnhSmwkau1sl2y_J-krlKnkKR0OBWwgFSvOczm9c5EDFxSDgnNeXXAUK0R1jYSV4IStYRWzQsfchSEKsbpWI0Qt9JnNia3pRB7w9L9qK1hTnTXxiiKD_KRDLhnhsxtsRjpwwUApgPgFX3M454BvQN10OFU0c87zmfWUyKY-6jvZu1O8ZpwdLugrp6m6PE4G4jfON1YZ-xfEBl7dr51v8hLiVAqaFye19b9wsctLBaDme_yDoo15LMNjGR7L8FiGv5fhxziOfwAA2ZPU3gcAAA)

## Source code:

- dapp connection code: [GCScript DSL](Arguments%20and%20ISL.gcscript)
- frontend (using @gamechanger-finance/gc): [HTML5 dapp](Arguments%20and%20ISL.html)
- frontend (without official library): [Native HTML5 dapp](Arguments%20and%20ISL_nolib.html)

Dapp code was autogenerated by [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground)

## GCScript code (dapp connection):
```json
{
  "title": "Arguments and ISL",
  "description": "Script that will test and explore subroutines, argument passing and ISL execution",
  "type": "script",
  "returnURLPattern": "http://localhost:3000/demo/api/dapp",
  "exportAs": "argsAndISL",
  "run": {
    "runSeveralTimes": {
      "type": "importAsScript",
      "args": {
        "foo": "{'this should be computed into a string'}",
        "bar": "{uuid()}",
        "baz": "{'uuid()'}"
      },
      "argsByKey": {
        "0": "{'uuid()'}",
        "2": {
          "{uuid()}": "{uuid()}"
        }
      },
      "from": [
        "",
        "",
        ""
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

## Run standalone QR dapp connection: 

You can use [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground) in `QR URL Transport` mode to capture results

[![This GCScript/URL is too large! make it shorter uploading parts to GCFS. Unable to generate QR code](Arguments%20and%20ISL.png)](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Arguments%20and%20ISL.png)
